20110114023515.000|20110114023516.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DR. LEMOLE SAYS HE 
20110114023516.000|20110114023517.000|CC1|WAS ENCOURAGED BY THE FACT THAT 
20110114023517.000|20110114023519.000|CC1|SHE SEEMS TO BE TRACKING        
20110114023519.000|20110114023520.000|CC1|MOVEMENTS WITH HER EYES.        
20110114023520.000|20110114023521.000|CC1|>> SO THINK ABOUT IT.           
20110114023521.000|20110114023524.000|CC1|WHEN YOU FIRST WAKE UP IN THE   
20110114023524.000|20110114023526.000|CC1|MORNING, YOU'RE ALL BLURRY EYED 
20110114023526.000|20110114023527.000|CC1|AND YOUR EYES AREN'T FOCUSING.

20110114023528.000|20110114023529.000|CC1|START TO FOCUS.

20110114023529.000|20110114023530.000|CC1|SIGNS.                          
20110114023530.000|20110114023531.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GIFFORDS HAS ALSO  
20110114023531.000|20110114023534.000|CC1|MOVED BOTH ARMS AND BOTH LEGS.  
20110114023534.000|20110114023535.000|CC1|SHE SEEMS TO BE COMMUNICATING   
20110114023535.000|20110114023536.000|CC1|WITH HER HANDS.                 
20110114023536.000|20110114023537.000|CC1|STAFFERS TELL NBC NEWS, AT ONE  
20110114023537.000|20110114023538.000|CC1|POINT SHE STARTED PLAYING WITH  
20110114023538.000|20110114023540.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND'S WEDDING RING.     
20110114023540.000|20110114023542.000|CC1|NOW PHYSICAL THERAPY HAS BEGUN. 
20110114023542.000|20110114023545.000|CC1|>> HER LEGS ARE OFF THE SIDE OF 
20110114023545.000|20110114023548.000|CC1|THE BED AND WE START EXERCISING 
20110114023548.000|20110114023551.000|CC1|HER MUSCLES, GETTING BALANCE,   
20110114023551.000|20110114023552.000|CC1|GETTING STIMULUS TO THE BRAIN.  
20110114023552.000|20110114023553.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THERE ARE STILL
20110114023553.000|20110114023554.000|CC1|CONCERNS.

20110114023555.000|20110114023556.000|CC1|PNEUMONIA OR BLOOD CLOTS.

20110114023601.000|20110114023602.000|CC1|SEVERAL DAYS.                   
20110114023602.000|20110114023604.000|CC1|>> Reporter: STILL, THEY SAY    
20110114023604.000|20110114023605.000|CC1|JUST FIVE DAYS AFTER BEING SHOT 
20110114023605.000|20110114023607.000|CC1|IN THE HEAD, THE CONGRESSWOMAN  
20110114023607.000|20110114023609.000|CC1|COULDN'T BE DOING ANY BETTER.   
20110114023609.000|20110114023611.000|CC1|>> MIRACLES HAPPEN EVERY DAY.

20110114023636.000|20110114023637.000|CC1|>>> WHEN CONGRESSWOMAN GABBY    
20110114023637.000|20110114023639.000|CC1|GIFFORDS FIRST HOPED HER EYES,  
20110114023639.000|20110114023643.000|CC1|IT WASN'T WHILE PRESIDENT OBAMA 
20110114023643.000|20110114023645.000|CC1|WAS IN THE ROOM, HE HAD JUST

20110114023646.000|20110114023649.000|CC1|IT WAS WHILE NEW YORK DEMOCRATIC
20110114023649.000|20110114023650.000|CC1|SENATOR KIRSTEN GILLIBRAND WAS  
20110114023650.000|20110114023653.000|CC1|IN HER ROOM, ALONG WITH A FEW   
20110114023653.000|20110114023655.000|CC1|OTHERS.                         
20110114023655.000|20110114023655.000|CC1|SENATOR GILLIBRAND AND          
20110114023655.000|20110114023657.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS STARTED  
20110114023657.000|20110114023658.000|CC1|OUT IN CONGRESS TOGETHER AND    
20110114023658.000|20110114023659.000|CC1|HAVE REMAINED FRIENDS.          
20110114023659.000|20110114023700.000|CC1|THE TWO COUPLES RECENTLY WENT   
20110114023700.000|20110114023701.000|CC1|OUT FOR A PIZZA DINNER AND I

20110114025237.000|20110114025240.000|CC1|      THAT SCRATCH DENTURES     
20110114025240.000|20110114025240.000|CC1|  LEAVING MICROSCOPIC CREVICES  
20110114025240.000|20110114025243.000|CC1|     WHERE BACTERIA CAN GROW

20110114025253.000|20110114025255.000|CC1|       AND SOAK EVERY DAY.

20110114025301.000|20110114025301.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110114025301.000|20110114025302.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110114025302.000|20110114025304.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110114025304.000|20110114025304.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110114025304.000|20110114025308.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110114025308.000|20110114025308.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110114025308.000|20110114025310.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110114025310.000|20110114025312.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110114025312.000|20110114025314.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110114025314.000|20110114025314.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110114025314.000|20110114025316.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110114025316.000|20110114025316.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110114025316.000|20110114025318.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110114025318.000|20110114025318.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110114025318.000|20110114025320.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110114025320.000|20110114025322.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110114025322.000|20110114025322.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110114025322.000|20110114025324.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110114025324.000|20110114025324.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110114025324.000|20110114025326.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110114025326.000|20110114025326.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110114025326.000|20110114025329.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110114025329.000|20110114025329.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110114025329.000|20110114025332.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110114025332.000|20110114025332.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110114025332.000|20110114025333.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110114025333.000|20110114025333.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110114025333.000|20110114025335.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110114025335.000|20110114025337.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110114025337.000|20110114025337.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110114025337.000|20110114025339.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110114025339.000|20110114025339.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110114025339.000|20110114025341.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110114025341.000|20110114025342.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110114025342.000|20110114025342.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110114025342.000|20110114025344.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110114025344.000|20110114025344.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110114025344.000|20110114025347.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110114025347.000|20110114025347.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110114025347.000|20110114025349.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110114025349.000|20110114025350.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110114025350.000|20110114025350.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110114025350.000|20110114025353.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110114025353.000|20110114025353.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110114025353.000|20110114025355.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110114025355.000|20110114025355.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110114025355.000|20110114025357.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110114025357.000|20110114025357.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110114025357.000|20110114025359.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110114025359.000|20110114025359.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110114025359.000|20110114025401.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110114025401.000|20110114025401.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110114025401.000|20110114025404.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110114025404.000|20110114025405.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110114025405.000|20110114025407.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110114025407.000|20110114025407.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110114025407.000|20110114025410.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,

20110114025410.000|20110114025412.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
